Name: Temperance Apple Mojito
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: PLACE mint, lemon, lime and sugar in glass. Half fill glass with crushed ice and CHURN (stir). Add more crushed ice to fill glass. Add apple juice, top with soda and CHURN some more. Serve with straws.
History: Created in 2002 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola, London, England. For more recipes, its origins and history, see the Mojito Cocktail .
